issue.title: [C++] Add IPC tests for date/time types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-534](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-534). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I don't believe this are being directly tested right now. Follow up to ARROW-33

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-534?focusedCommentId=15906411) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/371. If we use different byte widths for different time resolutions (per ARROW-617) we'll need to do some follow up work

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-534?focusedCommentId=15906562) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 371
